page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER
page.content: This area is covered by the Police Station at Newark from which all police services come. The local Policeman lives in Bilsthorpe with his wife and 4 children who attend the local school. He and 2 other local policeman cover Bilsthorpe, Eakring, Kirklington, Farnsfield, Edingley, Halam and Rufford. Bilsthorpe of this area causes more problems than the others. Vandalism of the Telephone Boxes and the Village War-memorial Clock being regular occurences. However the main problems for the local police are caused by the traffic accidents of the trunk roads A614 and A617.
